Ahmed Hajeri (amụrụ na Nọvemba 16, 1948) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Tunisia.

O wee kwaga France na 1968 ebe ọ zutere Roland Morand onye na-ese ihe.
N'afọ 1977, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi na Galerie Messine de Paris
N'afọ 1985, o gosipụtara na Medina Gallery na Tunis na Phyllis Kind Gallery na New York City
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ihe osise n'oge 1988 Summer Olympic Games na Seoul.
